!3 !-DcuCompileTimes-! Build Verification

!4 Build (Force Build)

|script |!-SlimProxy.Process-!|
|run|cmd.exe /c ${WDDT_ROOT}\Projects\DcuCompileTimes\_DcuCompileTimes.Build.bat|
|ensure|output contains|Build successful|
|check|last exit code|0|

!4 !-BuildAndRun-! (Smart Build)

|script |!-SlimProxy.Process-!|
|run|cmd.exe /c ${WDDT_ROOT}\Projects\DcuCompileTimes\_DcuCompileTimes.BuildAndRun.bat|
|check|last exit code|0|
|show|last output|
|ensure|output contains|Skipping build|
|ensure|output contains|Total time|
